.. _user:

#################
PydyGp User Guide
#################

This guide is intdended as an introductory overview of PydyGp and
explains how to install and make use of the most important features.
For detailed reference documentation of the functions and classes contained in
the package, see the :ref:`reference`.

.. toctree::
   :numbered:

   modules/kernels
   modules/gaussian_process
   modules/mlfm
   modules/example
